he Tower of Pronouncement was a sacred tower located in the capital city of Skuld in Mulhorand during the midâ€“14 century DR.
The Tower was located at the entrance into the City of the Gods in the northcentral part of the city. It was flanked on both sides by the Temple of Horus-Re. 
The Tower of Pronouncement was used by Mulhorands God-Kings to make announcements, though this rare occurrence usually only happened once a century.
